title: A36 & A42 Album cut cards listed on Ebay
author: hcv123

posts.post_title: A36 & A42 Album cut cards listed on Ebay
posts.post_content:
If this post isn't welcome here, please delete it.

I could find no sales history, so opted to go the Ebay route.  Thought some here might be interested.  

I just listed 2 groups of cards with $9.99 starting bids and no reserves:

1888 Goodwin Champion A36 Album cut cards (same images as N162's) including, King Kelly, Cap Anson, John Sullivan, and Harry Beecher (1st football card)

and

1888 Kimball Champions A42 Album cut cards (same images as N184's)

You can see them all here:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_dkr=1&iconV2Request=true&_blrs=recall_filtering&_ssn=favorite_things&store_cat=0&store_name=myfavoriteraresportsmemorabilia&_oac=1&_nkw=1888[/url]
I’m a new member at net54 and I wanted to let you know that I bought a number of your A36 and A42 cards on eBay. So happy to have grabbed them. Thanks!
